title: You won’t find this deal on Amazon: Get Dollar Flight Club for just $60
content:
Macworld

Analysts predict that the cost of air travel is going to keep climbing. Want to be able to afford a trip this year? Then do what others have done and get Dollar Flight Club. And right now is a great time since you can get a Premium Plus+ Lifetime Subscription at a great price during Deal Days.

Dollar Flight Club is a tool that can help make your dream vacation a reality. It monitors fluctuations in air travel rates and then alerts you when deals occur so you can act on them fast. It’s so effective, in fact, that families can save up to $2,000 off the cost of every vacation they take.

And it works really well — which is why they boast over 1 million worldwide users, positive reviews from Forbes and CNN, and scored an impressive user rating of 4.4 out of 5 stars on Trustpilot. If you’re planning a trip, then Dollar Flight Club is a must-have. And especially during Deal Days since you can get it for so little.

Get a lifetime Premium Plus+ subscription to Dollar Flight Club for just $59.97 — until 11:59 pm on July 14.
